holidays.title: National Look-Alike Day
holidays.description: The perfect day to try to convince people that Beyoncé is your look-alike.
An international celebration during which people come together to consume cannabis and advocate for its legalization.

holidays.title: International Cli-Fi Day
holidays.description: International Cli-Fi Day is a perfect opportunity to raise awareness about the importance of sustainable practices.

holidays.title: Landing of the 33 Patriots Day
holidays.description: Today is Landing of the 33 Patriots Day. Make the perfect tribute to their ultimate sacrifice.

holidays.title: Lima Bean Respect Day
holidays.description: Prepare your appetite as we enthusiastically celebrate this legume with so many names.

holidays.title: Look Alike Day
holidays.description: Find your long-lost twin and celebrate your duplicate human on National Look Alike Day.

holidays.title: National Cheddar Fries Day
holidays.description: Today’s about stuffing your face with the best cheddar fries you can get your hands on!

holidays.title: National Death Doula Day
holidays.description: This day is a special occasion to raise awareness about the work Doulas do!

holidays.title: National Pineapple Upside-Down Cake Day
holidays.description: Tingle your taste buds with this tropical delight!

holidays.title: National Stop Snoring Week
holidays.description: Give snoring the boot and explore the roots of the issue during National Stop Snoring Week.

holidays.title: UN Chinese Language Day
holidays.description: Culture and traditions are kept alive with the events on the UN Chinese Language Day.

holidays.title: Volunteer Recognition Day
holidays.description: We’re putting our hands together to applaud these kind heroes of our society.

holidays.title: Yom HaZikaron
holidays.description: Yom HaZikaron is the official remembrance day of fallen soldiers and victims of terrorism.

holidays.title: Jay Park’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented singer/songwriter has taken the Korean music industry by storm.

holidays.title: Luther Vandross’s Birthday
holidays.description: Vandross has been labeled “The Best Voice of a Generation” for his sweet and soulful vocals.

holidays.title: Shemar Moore’s Birthday
holidays.description: With a career spanning over 25 years, this actor, model, and TV personality is worth celebrating!

holidays.title: Spencer X’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this gifted star, who has rapidly expanded his fanbase, nothing can stop him.
